(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:11 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Ruitool Saw

How did we get our start?

Ruitool is specialises in woodworking tools and we have a wide range of tools that will make your work more efficient and convenient.

What makes our products unique?

1.Durable & Flexible Saw Blade

2.SK5 high-carbon steel

3.Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

4.Comfortable Handle

Why do we love what we do?

Our staff have previous experience in woodworking. We know exactly which products are really effective and easy to use. And we hope that our products will make your work easier and more enjoyable.

【Durable & Flexible Saw Blade】: The hand saw blade is made of SK5 high-carbon steel. The Japanese pull saw teeth are processed by a high-frequency hardening machine imported from Japan, and the hardness can reach HRC60-63 degrees.
【Double Edged】: One side of Japanese hand saw is 17TPI for cutting hardwood, and the other side is 14TPI for cutting softwood.
【Hardened 3-Edge Teeth】: The hand saw has three-sided grinding gear design, sharp edge, faster chip removal, and smoother cutting.
【Comfortable Handle】: Exquisite beech wood handle and slight curve design make the saw handle comfortable to hold, and the operation is more labor-saving.
【Enrich Your Woodworking Life】: Straight shank double-sided small hand saw, small and light, suitable for fine cutting and small parts production, it is the best choice for woodworking DIY.

Flexible Saw Blade

Wood saw with 1/50” ultra-thin saw blade, light weight and flexible, high toughness and wear-resistant, suitable for joinery flush cutting.

Comfortable Beech Handle

Ryoba saw non-slip durable beech wood handle, compact and beautiful. Very suitable for woodworking beginners.

Two Different TPI

Double edged design, one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI. Can better meet different cutting needs.

Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

The three-blade serration is hardened to effectively improve the sharpness and wear resistance. The cutting speed of the saw is 3 times faster than that of an ordinary saw.

Read more

Product description CMWDG Wood Carving Drill Bits 20Pcs Set Unlike Any Other:The solid tungsten carbide burr set gives you a massive selection of shapes for all types of cuts, It will leave a smoother finish than single cut burrs due to producing smaller chips as they cut away the material. Used for medium-light stock removal, deburring, finishing, and cleaning. ★Carbide Burr Material:wood carving bits are made from highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand up to time. Package: 20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this rotary grinder burr bit set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping. Box Size: 2.51”x1.73”x0.78” ★ Multi-Purpose Drill bit set for metal precision metalworking, engineering, toolmaking, welding, deburring, jewelry making, or if you enjoy various DIY arts and crafts or hobbies such as wood carving. ★ After Sales Service If you have any questions about our micro drill bit set, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns within 24 business hours.
【Wood Carving Bits】Ideal for precision metalworking, engineering, tool making, welding, deburring, jewelry making, and hobbies such as various DIY arts and crafts or wood carving;wood carving bits are made of highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand the test of time .
【Rotary Tool Accessories Kit】The 20-Piece Wood Drill Bit Kit includes everything you need to cut, shape, grind, polish and remove sharp edges. And is compatible with ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic and even stone. The kit includes suitable for all types of cuts such as impellers, cylinders, cylinders, cones and needles.
【Professional Tools】Unlike similar products on the market, these engraved burrs reduce cutting time. Suitable for castings, implant tools, forging and finishing trimming, veining and weld cleaning in a variety of metallic and non-metallic dies.
【Cutting Tool Adaptability】Most die grinders and small rotary tools with three-jaw chucks for precise centering. Wide variety for fine detail work including cutting, engraving, grinding, polishing, trimming, deburring, chamfering, grooving, reaming, hollowing, bevelling, repairing, and Finishing.
【Easy Storage Gift Set】20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this Rotary Grinder Burr Bit Set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping.No more misplacing or losing your bits, they’re always available every time you need them.

4.5
Price: $7.99 - $6.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:47 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Features：

Various Shapes

20Pcs Different shapes Router Bits for most commonly used types, micro-drilling or cutting portion provided in various forms. Great for Wood Carving and Small Jobs,

Widly Used：

Suitable for wide range of materials such as wood, ABS, acrylic, PVC, resin, plastics, etc. Well-suited for detailed work, such as modelmaking, building and sanding dollhouse furniture, model trains, or miniature buildings and planes, house repair.

Application:

Router Carbide Engraving Bits can be worked with most mini-grinding rotary tools or die grinders such as for DREMEL, for Apollo, for Craftsman, for Chicago, for Silverline, GMC, CNC machinery, etc.

Physical Display

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.39 x 2.56 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 10, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ shengbenhao
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08N4YBBWH

【Multi-Funtions】20 Different carving router bits of the most commonly used types to meet different woodworking situations, each burr is shaped to fit different angles or situations. Suitable for carving, engraving, drilling, beveling, chamfering, grooving, reaming, shaping, hollowing.
【High Quality】Rotary Burr Set made of high speed steel (HSS) and coated titanium for long life, good wear-resistant, durable, faster cutting and high working efficiency. Save your time and money.
【High Compatibility】With 1/8 inch(3mm) shank, Length: 1.53inch(39mm), common-use sizes compatible with most engraving tools, rotary tools or die grinders, such as for Dremel, for Apollo, for Chicago and more.
【Widely Used】Applied in processing different kinds of materials including wood, plastic, ABS, PVC, acrylic or resin. Suitable for detailed work, such as house repair, DIY craft, building and sanding dollhouse furniture, model trains, or miniature buildings and planes.
【Quality Guarantee】20 Different Shape Rotary Burrs Set packaged in a clear plastic storage case. We provide 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED for 3 months. Please feel free to contact us if there is any problem or issue.
